verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Hold fast to your confidence
from beginning to the end
for the battle is not yours,
but the battle is the Lord's
For the race is not to the swift
it is not to the strong
to your confidence, hold on (REPEAT Verse)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Hold on to your confidence //
The battle is not yours
but the battle is the Lord's
To your confidence hold on
